summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York regarding warrants, with two attachments named Warrant_2.pdf and Warrant_l.pdf. It appears to be official correspondence related to the Epstein case investigation.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Sender of the email regarding warrants, from the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Warrant Email Correspondence
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends an email regarding warrants, with two warrant attachments.

keyFacts: Email sent on June 29, 2020, regarding warrants in the Epstein case.
Sent by an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
Includes two attachments: Warrant_2.pdf and Warrant_l.pdf.
Originates from One Saint Andrew's Plaza, the address for the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
Indicates ongoing legal activity and warrant-related procedures in 2020.
